title: How to Build a Minecraft Village

steps.title: Build a foundation.
steps.content: Build a foundation. It's important because you'll get the idea of how large to build, preferably around 50x60. You can break this afterwards, yet having a wall around your village will help protect it from mobs. Having a gate will allow access to the outside of your village. It's better to have somewhere for your White House, so make more places for the White House, probably 55x70. But you can decide how big is your White House.

steps.title: Build the village's White House.
steps.content: Build the village's White House. Preferably, you will be the mayor as you built it all, so it can also be your house. However, this is optional.

steps.title: Build a road in your village.
steps.content: Build a road in your village. You can also build city roads if you think your village needs to be better.

steps.title: Build houses.
steps.content: Build houses. Size and the amount of houses in the street is all up to you. If you have a small foundation, maybe 3 cottages on each side. If it is large, maybe 4 houses on each side.

steps.title: Build community buildings.
steps.content: Build community buildings. The basic ones: Shop/Market/Supermarket Restaurant/Cafe/Pub Village Government Building/Town/City Hall Village/Town/City Courts TV/Radio stations Bank/Tax Court Preschool/Elementary/High School/Collage/University Churches/Cathedrals/Mosques/Buddhist Temples Jails/Police/Fire Stations/Hospitals Wind/Solar/Oil/Nuclear/Coal Power Plant Water Tower/Pumping Stations Sewage Outflow Pipe/Treatment Plant Garbage Dumps/Incinerators/Recycling Centers

steps.title: Populate your village.
steps.content: Populate your village. You didn't build a village for yourself, so spawn some villagers by using /summon villager command. You can change the attributes of villagers upon summoning them.

steps.title: Come up with where people will work.
steps.content: Come up with where people will work. It depends, really. What are your community lots? Having a shop will allow shopkeepers, and a school will allow teachers. Think about that.

steps.title: Write some laws.
steps.content: Write some laws. You provide a nice shelter for your citizens, so use the imagination to create laws for your village. Also, think of some punishments for those rebels and zombies who break your law(s).

steps.title: Make a big underground shelter for your villagers to secure them or store things.Probably 25x25.
steps.content: Make a big underground shelter for your villagers to secure them or store things.Probably 25x25.

steps.title: You've built a village.
steps.content: You've built a village. Have fun playing as a mayor! Be creative! You can also try building some cool skyscraper houses!
